class.name: VisualScriptTypeCast
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node that casts the given value to another type.
class.description: [VisualScriptTypeCast] will perform a type conversion to an [Object]-derived type.

members.member: The target script class to be converted to. If none, only the [member base_type] will be used.
The target type to be converted to.
